DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare change spinal stiffness back muscle activity spinal manipulative therapy ( SMT ) responder , non-responders asymptomatic participant . Additionally , investigator want compare amount lumbar degeneration SMT responder , non-responders asymptomatic participant . This study also determine presence pain modifies post-SMT spinal stiffness back muscle activity .
DOC.brief_title: The Underlying Mechanism Spinal Manipulative Therapy Effect Pain Physical Outcome Measures
DOC.detailed_description: SMT common manual therapy treat patient mechanical low back pain ( LBP ) . SMT define high velocity , low amplitude thrust technique . Specifically , clinician stand beside supine patient . The patient passively side-bent towards side manipulate . The clinician passively rotate patient delivers high velocity , low amplitude thrust anterior superior iliac spine posteroinferior direction . SMT indicate patient LBP judge spinal hypomobility malalignment . Recently , collaborator discover LBP subject benefit SMT identify prior treatment five-item clinical prediction rule . Compared non-responders , respond SMT : 1 ) 30 % decrease modify Oswestry Disability Index score , 2 ) significant immediate decrease spinal stiffness , 3 ) concurrent change lumbar multifidus muscle activity . Taken together , physical change experience SMT responder alone provide unique opportunity well understand mechanism underlie SMT . Since spinal stiffness important physical indicator SMT response , important understand causal relation pain , paraspinal/trunk muscle activity spinal stiffness . Although research show positive correlation pain muscle activity , paraspinal muscle activity spinal stiffness , causal relation pain , paraspinal/trunk muscle activity spinal stiffness remain unknown . Given background , induction temporary benign experimental pain asymptomatic individual help clarify causal relation improve understand physical response responder follow pain resolution SMT .
DOC.criteria: Self ambulatory participant without acute/chronic LBP . LBP define pain discomfort costal margin gluteal fold , without leg pain . All include LBP participant must modify Oswestry Disability Index score > 12 % Have ability lie prone least 20 minute . Asymptomatic participant free LBP time visit . With medical 'red flag ' condition cancer , cauda equine syndrome , spinal infection , fracture systemic disease History arm surgery , shoulder arm pain may hinder arm lift prone History orthopedic neurological surgery spine , pelvis hip Inflammatory active infective process involve spine shoulder Spondylolisthesis , ankylose spondylitis , scoliosis great 20 degree ( Cobb 's angle ) Pregnancy Osteoporosis Neurologic deficit sign nerve root compression Congenital spinal disorder ( spina bifida ) , Participation competitive sport 3 time per week History spinal manipulation lumbar multifidus stabilization exercise training within past 4 week Additional exclusion criterion asymptomatic participant include : back pain precede year , exceed 1 week ; miss least 1 work day back pain ; consultation back problem .
